TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GregorianCalendar extends Java.Util.Calendar

Docs.summary: GregorianCalendar is a concrete subclass of Calendar and provides the standard calendar system used by most of the world.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Value of the ERA field indicating the common era (Anno Domini), also known as CE.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Add (Java.Util.CalendarField field, int amount);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(valuetype Java.Util.CalendarField field, int32 amount) cil managed

Docs.param: the amount of date or time to be added to the field.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified (signed) amount of time to the given calendar field, based on the calendar's rules.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the specified field is DST_OFFSET or ZONE_OFFSET.
